# Life Blindness
## Overview
**Type:** disease, inhaled

**Save:** Fortitude DC 21

**Onset:** 1 day

**Frequency:** 

**Effect:** Special

**Cure:** 

The infected victim loses all ability to perceive living creatures, even plants. All such beings are treated as invisible, silent, and odorless. The loneliness and alienation eventually drive the victim to be completely anti-social, suffering effects similar to the *emotion (despair)* and *emotion (hate)* spells.

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness, pg. 30
